attributes.action: Justice for Gunner Robert Steven Cutting
attributes.additional_details: Robert was killed in Northern Ireland in 1972 the family have spent over 40 years trying to get the MOD to admit that they were responsible,for not investigating the death,not treating the person responsible for his death as a hostile witness even after he admitted shooting Robert in the back.Roberts death was swept under the carpet,they lied to the family about how he died.help us get justice for Robert. A report by the historical enquiries team found the Royal Marines negligent,conveniently the MOD are still refusing to admit that a death of a young soldier was totally mis handled
